rows.label: bf09390150_0010
rows.name: Bandits?

rows.label: bf09390150_0020
rows.name:
Probably. After all, Saika looks
pretty damn human for a Blade.

rows.label: bf09390150_0030
rows.name: She'd be worth a lot to some people.

rows.label: bf09390150_0040
rows.name:
They sell 'em.
Line up the cores with pretty pictures of the Blade inside.

rows.label: bf09390150_0050
rows.name: It's the same as it ever was...

rows.label: bf09390150_0060
rows.name: What?

rows.label: bf09390150_0070
rows.name:
As soon as people are denied something
they desire, they try to take it by force.

rows.label: bf09390150_0080
rows.name: ...Not everyone's like that.

rows.label: bf09390150_0090
rows.name:
Oh, some give up prematurely,
but the feeling is there, I assure you.

rows.label: bf09390150_0100
rows.name: Well in that case, why bother protecting them?

rows.label: bf09390150_0110
rows.name: Why not let people do whatever?

rows.label: bf09390150_0120
rows.name: To remind myself.

rows.label: bf09390150_0130
rows.name: I must never forget what kind of beings humans are.

rows.label: bf09390150_0140
rows.name: Is that what helping me was, too?

rows.label: bf09390150_0150
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hm...

rows.label: bf09390150_0160
rows.name: A long time ago...

rows.label: bf09390150_0170
rows.name: I seemed to recall seeing a very similar scene...

rows.label: bf09390150_0180
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...?

rows.label: bf09390150_0190
rows.name: Perhaps...

rows.label: bf09390150_0200
rows.name: That too was one face of humanity...
